queries.querystring: select f.FUNCTION, f.DESCRIPTION, f.PARENT, f.WSC, (select lc.description from MRQR_LOOKUP_CODES lc where lc.code=f.wsc and lc.type='WSC') WSC_DESC, f.MAN_ORG, f.FICTIVE, f.ESSENTIAL, f.SUPERVISED, concat(f.REPORT_MAINTENANCE,f.REPORT_LOGISTIC,f.REPORT_STATUS) REP_MLS, f.FUEL_NSN, f.CO2_TAX_APPLICABLE from MRQR_ASSETS a join MRQR_functions f on a.function=f.function where a.ASSET='pASSET' limit 50
select aos.STATUS, aos.STATUSDATE, aos.ORGANISM, aos.WO from MRQR_ASSETS_OPERATIONAL_STATUS aos where aos.ASSET='pASSET' LIMIT 10
select AM.METER, AM.PHYSICAL, AM.LAST, AM.METERDATE, AM.FUEL, AM.CALCULATED from MRQR_ASSETS_METER AM where AM.ASSET='pASSET' limit 50
